settings.text: We exist to help nonprofits do their world-changing work. Andy okay raises money to important causes by offering incredible limited edition art for a price YOU decide. What you give for your art will benefit an important organisation.

settings.heading: How The Giving is Done
settings.paragraph: We want to use the power of art to create change. Real change. As environmentalists and artists our mission is to guide you on your journey and empower you to do your best when it comes to the environment. You don't have to be a hardcore environmentalist to make a difference. It's the little things, like riding your bike to work, bringing your own grocery bag, and buying an item that gives profits to charity - they all add up. Especially when thousands of other people start doing them too.

settings.heading: Planet
settings.paragraph: An important part of being in business to improve lives means taking good care of the place we all call home, and we’re committed to doing our part.

settings.heading: People
settings.paragraph: Andy okay is a community, too, and we strive to maintain a culture rooted in Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, and Anti-Racism. We support our employees and our partners to help create positive change.

settings.heading: Product
settings.paragraph: Find the art you love and pay what you want for it. Every artwork on the site benefits an important organization.
“If we don’t clean up our mess, we’ll be history. We must use all the tools at our disposal to secure a safer, more just future.”

settings.heading: 1 Million To Charity by 2030
settings.paragraph: Our vision is to give 1 million to charity by 2030, which will help those organisations do their world-changing work. So far we've supported 12 important nonprofits and help them raise over $20.000.

settings.text: We work with charitable organizations all across the world and help them raise money with the power of art.
Together, we can prioritize purpose over profit and protect this wondrous planet, our only home.
Together, we can prioritize purpose over profit and protect this wondrous planet, our only home.
